bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tuo 陰脫 , yin prolapse . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi suan 石蒜 quotes Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 : 產腸脫下：老鴉蒜即酸頭草一把，以水三碗，煎一碗半，去滓熏 洗，神效 , “For prolapse of the birth intestine : [take] 1 bundle of lao ya suan , i.e. suan tou cao , and boil in the amount of water filling 3 bowls down to 1.5 bowls. Discard the dregs and [use the liquid] for fumigation and rinsing. Wondrously effective”.
